description: Sola-Ui Nuada-Re Sophia-Ri is the daughter of the head of the spiritual evocation division. She is engaged to Kayneth as a result of a strategic marriage arrangement and the decision of her family to entrust their crest to her brother instead. However, she is coldhearted and does not reciprocate Kayneth`s love for her; instead, she becomes infatuated with Lancer, who in turn does not reciprocate her feelings and regards her only as his Master`s wife.
name: Sola-Ui Nuada-Re Sophia-Ri
